quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.summary: Q Technology (Group) Co Ltd is a company principally engaged in the design, research and development, manufacture and sales of camera modules and fingerprint recognition modules. The Company operates its businesses through two segments. The Camera Modules segment engaged in design, manufacture and sales of camera modules. The Fingerprint Recognition modules segment engaged in design, manufacture and sales of fingerprint recognition modules. The Company’s products cover dual/multiple camera modules, optical image stabilization (OIS) camera modules, periscope camera modules, automotive camera modules and others. The Company’s products are mainly used in camera and fingerprint recognition module market for intelligent mobile terminals such as smart phone and tablet personal computer (PC) brands, Internet of Things (IoT), smart vehicles and others. The Company mainly operates its businesses in the domestic and overseas markets.
